posts.title: dog post
posts.author: San Francisco
posts.body: If you’re a dog parent, you know what it’s like trying to make your home look amazing while having to deal with the many accessories that come with having a dog. Between toys, leashes, and dog beds, it’s definitely not easy! For most things, a basket can hide away clutter whenever a guest drops by, but dog beds are harder to conceal.

posts.title: food post
posts.author: San
posts.body: James Beard Award-winning and self-made chef Naomi Pomeroy’s debut cookbook, featuring nearly 140 lesson-driven recipes designed to improve the home cook’s understanding of professional techniques and flavor combinations in order to produce simple, but show-stopping meals.

posts.title: sports post
posts.author: San Frank
posts.body: Rio 2016 chief spokesman Mario Andrada said: As citizens of Brazil and as sports fans, we don't think booing is the right attitude, even when you are in a one-to-one competition and a young Brazilian has the chance to beat the world champion.
